forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers this morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers for the afternoon hours. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers for the afternoon. High 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the evening. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the evening. Low 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 21F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed mostly cloudy skies and a few snow showers later at night. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed mostly cloudy skies and a few snow showers later at night. Low 23F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few snow showers around in the evening, otherwise mostly cloudy. Low around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with a few snow showers in the evening. Low 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers around in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers developing during the afternoon. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the morning. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the morning. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing later during the night. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few snow showers after midnight. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix early will transition to some snow showers late. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: A wintry mix early will transition to some snow showers late. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.
